title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Fundamental concepts of probability, random variables and mathematical expectation, some discrete and continuous probability distributions, joint probability distributions, sampling distributions, estimation and hypothesis testing, correlation and regression, analysis of variance (one- way and twoway classifications).
